body.name: FelixKing Ergonomic Office Chair, Headrest Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support, Home Office Swivel Task Chair with High Back and Armrest, Adjustable Height Gaming Chair(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 7 hrs 59 mins
features: ✌【Ergonomic Design】FelixKing reliable ergonomic office chair provides 5 supporting points(head/shoulder/back/ hips/ hands) and an proper lumbar support, allowing you to maintain the correct sitting posture for a more comfortable experience, releasing pressure and relieving shoulder and neck pain from long hours of work.. FelixKing office chair as a simple extension to your everyday work, which is perfect for everyday. Sturdy and supportive, this executive office chair holds up to 300 lbs.

✌【Breathable Mesh Fabric】The executive office chair is made of high-quality breathable polyester mesh that allows airflow to keep you cool and comfortable. Stout Y-bracket backrest, soft and thickly wrapped adjustable armrests and anti-collapse high-density pure nature sponge soft cushions perfectly prevent the accumulation of sweat and heat, which will help you feel more comfortable in jobs that require long time sitting.

✌【Flexible Adjustable Functions】The rolling swivel computer chair is built with adjustable heigh: 10cm/3.9inch lift up and down, 5cm/2inch adjustable headrest（30° flip up） and backrest, 90-120° tilt adjustment, 90° flip-up handrail and 360° free rotation, supporting shoulder, back, waist and coccyx relaxation. Upgraded adjustable headrest and lumbar support, widened backrest and high-density armrests, which enhance ergonomically tailored comfort, to meet the needs of work and leisure time.

✌【Reliable & Durable Chair】The comfortable office chair uses quiet PU castors, sturdy three-stage air rod, and a thickened explosion-proof seatpalte with strong bearing capacity have improved safety and stability, which give you more comfort and double coverage. All the details make this desk office chair use longer. What's important, silent casters effectively protect the floor, so don't worry about disturbing your mood.

✌【No After-sales Worry】The mesh office chair can be assembled with the simple tools that come with packing. Refer to the clear instructions and you can fully assemble in about 15 minutes. And, the warranty is 1 year. If you have any problems, please free to contact us, and the customer service will provide customers with satisfactory solutions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dynamic Lumbar Support 5cm/2inch adjustable dynamic lumbar support design fits your body and provides you with the most effective and comfrtable ergonomic support. High-Density Thicker Cushion The cushion has been upgraded to be comfortable with added elasticity to perfectly fit the curve of your hips during break or work,releasing pressure. Sturdy Three-stage Air Rod The three-stage air rod bearing capacity, has passed SGS and BIFMA 300 lbs maximum load certification. It's more reliable and durable for you. Premium Base Plate Upgraded durable base plate has strong load-bearing capacity, which is very stable and safe, not leaning forward. You can use with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this chair to replace my worn out daily office chair. I took my time to consider a good number of highly-rated options, and this one met all my criteria. The item arrived with no damage, and the assembly instructions were clear. I appreciate the extra nuts and bolts included. I initially questioned whether the plastic material would be strong enough; but once assembled, I found the chair to be sturdy and supportive. Everything came together without difficulty. The component and build quality seem very good. I am 5'10" and 185 lbs: and I find the seat height adjustability, the seat cushion's firmness, the lumbar support, breathable mesh back, and swiveling headrest -- all comfortable. The recline feature adjusts to my preferred tension, and the arm rests swing up and out of the way easily, with the right amount of resistance. I have no problems working all day in this chair at my IT job. I can see why other reviewers mention the somewhat rough fabric on the arm rests, but it doesn't bother me at all. I would purchase this item again without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for lighter people
reviews.reviewText: Chair is excellent. Easy to build, nice looking and extremely comfortable. Good lumbar support. That said, I'd rate it for a person who weighs about 160lbs or less. I weigh 220 Lbs, and I can feel it straining under my weight. So keep that in mind if you are a larger person. The color for this chair is Teal...even though it says blue. Looks great and I highly recommend it. Was shipped in a sturdy cardboard box with extra protection taped in...manufacturer did a great job protecting it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: its good and comfortable, but trying to put the armrests/back piece onto the bottom cushion was really frustrating. i wouldnt recommend following the steps in order because of that. also, one of my arm rests came damaged, there are black stains all over the front of it. but overall i just wanted a comfortable office chair to replace my old gaming chair thats falling apart and this does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gaming chair. It was super easy to assemble. I’m a 5’3 woman and I was easily able to lift the box, carry it, and assemble it all myself. (Box was about 30lbs) Instructions were short and simple. I bought the blue color and it’s a lovely pale blue that goes well with any light blue decor. The picture in the description is color accurate.As far is as space is concerned, the chair fits easily under my very small gaming desk. With the arms up it slides almost completely under and is easily tucked away.The chair is super comfy, my back and head easily line up well with the design of the back arch and head rest. My feet touch the ground, even at the full height of the chair and I’m rather short so that is nice.The wheels swivel nicely with no issues, works well on carpet as well as hardwood. Chair spins extremely well, very minimal effort, and it stays in place without rolling away or spinning to the side either.The material could be a little bit softer, if I had one minor complaint that would be it. But it’s easy to clean and is super breathable for the summer months so it’s a fair trade off.For the price point you really can’t beat it. I looked through about 20 chairs in my search and I’m glad I settled on this one. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for something basic but comfy that’s not going to take up a ton of space in your room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Assemble and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I just purchased this office chair for my in-home office after several weeks of searching for a new chair. This chair was very easy to assemble and is very sturdy and comfortable. The chair does work and is very functional with the flip up arms allowing the chair to fully slide under my table desk. I usually don't need the armrests, but the right one helps keep my mouse hand's heel off the table top for gaming if I angle the armrest up at an angle slightly.Overall, I like this chair very much and it's good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Chair for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I got this at the recommendation of my roommate, who has the not-upgraded version of this. So far I am really pleased with it. It was a good price, really easy to assemble, and got here quickly. The color looks exactly like the picture as well. I wish it reclined a little bit, but it does have a rocking feature which is nice. I like that you can adjust the position of the headrest and the lumbar support, and the arms move up which makes it easy to tuck all the way up to my desk. I do have a motorized standing desk, so I was able to move the desk to the right height of the chair, but the chair does have adjustable height as well. It is lightweight and overall I think it works well for my needs. I am a writer, so I sit at my desk several hours a day, and this will work for that. I am not sure how it would work for people who work from home or for heavier people, as the seat is on the firmer side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: "I recently purchased this chair and I'm thoroughly impressed! The comfort level is exceptional, making it perfect for long hours of use. The design is sleek and fits well with my home office décor. I was pleasantly surprised by the sturdy build quality, which gives me confidence in its durability. Assembly was straightforward, and the instructions were clear. Overall, a fantastic purchase that has exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend for anyone in need of a reliable and comfortable chair."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My gamer adult son loves it
reviews.reviewText: I got this chair for my adult son for Christmas. He is a gamer and he needed something that gave him good back support and would not wear down like the fake leather plastic chairs. He loves the movable armrest. He loves the headrest and he loves the lumbar support of his chair. This was well worth the money. There are more expensive chairs, but this one did the ticket.
Everything as described and was delivered under 24 hrs. Easy to assemble, sturdy and comfortable chair.

So glad that I decided to go with this chair after lots of research and reading Amazon reviews.Firstly, it arrived early (yay!) Right away I was impressed with the size and how solid it was. I am also really pleased with the blue/white color which is very pretty and matches my office color scheme. It was super easy to put together. I did it by myself on my lunch break and started using it right away.The chair is firm, supportive and comfortable. I sit for 9+ hrs a day and have way less back and hip pain now. The headrest is a nice addition I wasn't expecting to like so much. I also love that everything's adjustable and can recline/rock which is nice while taking a break from work!

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable, reasonably priced ergonomic office chair
reviews.reviewText: Simple to set up, quick to assemble, comfortable, and easy to adjust. Highly recommend for anyone looking for an ergonomic office chair, comfortable for long periods of sitting and strong support on the head rest.

It's been a month since I've been using this chair and I think it's time to do a review.What I like:- a wide seat (in fact, there is a lot of space and you can even sit with your legs crossed)- the armrests are raised- you can adjust the height of the chair- you can adjust and fix the height of the headrest- a comfortable back (it is wide and the support for the lower back is very good and movable)- the material is strong (the plastic from which the chair is made looks really strong)- easy to assemble (it took me about 30 minutes to completely assemble it)- you can swing (but not fix in a lying position)Which I don't really like:- I think this is a relative disadvantage, but the seat cushion is made of mesh material, so the fabric is not too soft against the body (if, for example, you are wearing short shorts), I like softer materials, so I just laid a blanket on it, but it might be just for meOverall, a great chair for working from home, and sitting long hours!
I like what I got and it's not so costly as other brands or suppliers. I really like the lift up armrests that allows the chair to fit closer to the desk when stored.
